dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S519 IS: Chesapeake Bay Gateways and Watertrails Network Reauthorization Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Cardin (for himself, Ms. Mikulski, Mr. Coons, Mr. Carper, and Mr. Warner) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works

form.official-title: To amend the Chesapeake Bay Initiative Act of 1998 to permanently reauthorize the Chesapeake Bay Gateways and Watertrails Network.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Chesapeake Bay Gateways and Watertrails Network Reauthorization Act.

Section 502(c) of the Chesapeake Bay Initiative Act of 1998 (16 U.S.C. 461 note; Public Law 105â€“312) is amended by striking for and all that follows through the period at the end and inserting for each fiscal year..
